nodes.text: Docking pad RT209 a starport facility was located on Coruscant near the Imperial Complex.

The bulk freighter Doriella's Mystress, owned by the Rendar family and operated by RenTrans, was sabotaged at docking pad RT209 by mechanics under the direction of Black Sun leader Prince Xizor. This act resulted in the Doriella's Mystress crashing into Emperor Palpatine's private museum and killing its pilot, Stanton Rendar. In the wake of this supposed accident, the Rendar family was disgraced, Dash Rendar was removed from the Imperial Academy on Carida, and RenTrans underwent a hostile takeover by Xizor Transport Systems.
